name: V1_Ch6_LogicIdentity_TruthBox
intent: Define how truth identities and logical equivalence classes are managed.

domain.equivalence: Two formulas are equivalent if Π yields identical truth on all Ω-admissible assignments.

constraints.equivalence_relation: Logical equivalence must be reflexive, symmetric, transitive.
constraints.class_disjointness: No formula can belong to both tautology_class and contradiction_class.
constraints.Ω-scope: Truth evaluation restricted to Ω-admissible semantics.

cross_links.volume2_axioms: Truth equivalence classes used to decide valid emergent structures.
cross_links.structural_invariants: Some invariants are expressed as tautologies in this logic.
